name: (C) Best HP FS (RTU, Other Fossil Heat)
_description: Best available air source heat pump fully replacing original distillate RTU equipment

notes: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source). Ventilation savings are based on ComStock simulations of a variable speed HP RTU with energy recovery
savings are averaged across all states.

market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiple of 79% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane packaged unit (961852 sf) by square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane furnace or packaged unit (4543002 sf). Cooling equipment multiples determined by square feet in which given cooling system (e.g., RTAC, chiller) is pared with given heating system for the measure. Ventilation multiples determined by square feet in which given ventilation system (VAV or CAV) is paired with given heating system for the measure.
